00024 void SphericView::init(const WorldInformation & world_information ){
00025     View::init(world_information);
00026     octree_.reset(new Octree(8,view_radius_ * 2.0));
00027     octree_->create_tree(world_information.markers(),
00028                          world_information.obstacles(),
00029                          world_information.robot_data() );
00030 
00031 }

00033 std::set<View::RobotRef> SphericView::get_visible_robots(const RobotData& robot) const {
00034 
00035     return OctreeUtilities::get_visible_robots_by_radius(octree(),robot.position(), float(view_radius()) );
00036 }

00041 std::set<View::MarkerRef> SphericView::get_visible_markers(const RobotData& robot) const {
